column1: The Purple Pig////We walked in at 3:45pm on a Saturday hoping not to wait very long. The host took our name and number
column2: indicated we would wait 20-30 minutes. It was very hot and humid just outside of the restaurant so we walked a short distance to Starbucks. By the time we ordered coffee and before our order was called
column3: a text came in saying our table was ready. #GoodProblemToHave
